title: A Christmas Story
brief_description: On Christmas Eve, Fat Albert and the Cosby Kids give shelter to an out-of-town family who’s mother is about to give birth. At the same time, they try to save their clubhouse from destruction.
description: On Christmas Eve, Fat Albert and the Cosby Kids give shelter to an out-of-town family who’s mother is about to give birth. At the same time, they try to save their clubhouse from destruction.
